content: {"name": "Open Pantry of Greater Lowell", "alternate_name": "", "description": "", "email": "", "url": "https://theopenpantry.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "13 Hurd Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Downtown", "state_province": "MA", "postal_code": "01852", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.6427266, "longitude": -71.30823099999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(978) 453-6693", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "16:45"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "16:45"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "16:45"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "16:45"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Provide prepacked bags or boxes of food"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Social Security Card Required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: twice a month"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers and Clothes upon availability"}]}
